Title: Extends the authority of the county of Suffolk to form a county-wide sewer and wastewater management district
Summary: Creates the Suffolk county wastewater management district to recommend and establish one or more zones of assessment within the district, acquire interests in real property, prioritize district projects in accordance with the Suffolk county subwatershed wastewater plan and distribute grant proceeds within the district; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง256-b, amd ยง257, County L; amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law and the general municipal law, in relation to extending the authority of the county of Suffolk to form a county-wide sewer and wastewater management district
